articles.author: Brian Stelter, CNN Business
articles.title: Smartmatic is now suing Newsmax and OAN for 'disinformation campaign' - CNN
articles.description: Smartmatic, the voting technology company that is suing Fox News, some of its hosts and pro-Trump lawyers Rudy Giuliani and Sidney Powell for defamation, is now adding Newsmax and One America News Network to the list of defendants.
articles.content: New York (CNN Business)Smartmatic, the voting technology company that is suing Fox News, some of its hosts and pro-Trump lawyers Rudy Giuliani and Sidney Powell for defamation, is now adding Newsmax … [+3060 chars]

articles.title: Climate tech firms will be 'household names' by 2050, Microsoft exec says - CNBC International TV
articles.description: Microsoft President Brad Smith compared the race to build new climate technologies to America putting the first man on the moon.

articles.title: Anglo American appoints South African Duncan Wanblad as CEO to replace Mark Cutifani - Moneyweb
articles.description: Wanblad is the first local to be appointed to the position in more than a decade.
articles.content:
Anglo American has chosen a 54-year old South African, Duncan Wanblad, as the successor to outgoing CEO Mark Cutifani, who steps down in April next year after nine years at the helm.
